review:
My mother was gone through Knee Replacement Surgery.

i Strongly Recommend Dr. Haresh mangalani sir one of the Best Ortho Surgen. He is extremely dedicated, positive, caring, attentive, flexible and personal. He has always provided the absolute best care, and I believe, best advice and treatment during every visit. He goes an extra mile to help his patients and make them feel comfortable. He serves for Humanity, which is most important. I would highly recommend Anmmol Orthovision - A hospital which provides trustworthy treatment with care.

Very experience  surgeon.
My mother was undergone for TOTAL KNEE REPLACEMENT TREATMENT.
He treat his patient very smooth way.
Dr Haresh Manglani is an excellent orthopedic surgeon. Gives enough time to understand our problems. He is very systematic and methodical and patients feel very comfortable under his care.
Very very honest & experience doctor. I strongly recommend one of best surgen & best treatment hospital. Staff also so cooperative.

** ****** ********* ** ** ********* ******* very friendly and approachable person, passionate towards his profession and our country. During my father's shoulder injury, he has been a great help in taking a 75 years old person through gentle and wise journey to recovery. Kudos!
